page.title: 13BUCHLYVIE UNITED F.C.
page.content: {BUCHLYVIE UNITED FOOTBALL CLUB}was formed and a constitution drawn up in{ {1946}although there had been a village team for many years before. The club did not have their own playing field until{1977}when a pitch was made behind the school. The team, playing in amber and black, play in the{FORTH {AND ENDRICK LEAGUE,}a league of eleven teams from nearby villages. At the present time there are 28 signed players on the team books and the first half of the eighties has seen a fair measure of success for the club who won the{LEAGUE TROPHY}for the first time in{1982. THE MCGREGOR {FERGUSON CUP AND THE GARVIE TROPHY} have each been won three times and in{ {1984, THE TELFER TROPHY}was also won.New dressing rooms are being built as part of the village hall and will be ready for use for season 1986.
